testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say

testimonial1.quote: ReefQ has transformed how we sell jewelry online. Customers are more confident in their purchases, and returns have significantly decreased.

testimonial2.quote: Thanks to ReefQ technology, we can now showcase our entire jewelry collection in an interactive and engaging way. The results have been amazing!

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple process to add 3D visualization to your store

step1.title: Registration and Setup
step1.description: Create your account and configure the basic settings for your store

step2.title: Upload Jewelry Models
step2.description: Upload your product images and we'll transform them into high-fidelity 3D models

step3.title: Customize User Experience
step3.description: Customize the 3D viewer interface to match your brand and website design

step4.title: Integration and Launch
step4.description: Integrate the 3D viewer into your website using the simple code snippet we provide

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.subtitle: One-time payment, lifetime value
pricing.description: Choose the perfect plan for your business. No hidden fees, no monthly subscriptions.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know
faq.description: Couldn't find the answer you're looking for? Reach out to our customer support team.

question1.question: Do I need technical expertise to use ReefQ?
question1.answer: No, we designed ReefQ to be easy to use. All you need to do is upload your product images, and we take care of the rest. User-friendly interface and clear instructions are provided.

question2.question: How do I add the 3D viewer to my website?
question2.answer: After setting up your account, you'll get a simple code snippet that you can add to your website's HTML. We also offer integrations with popular e-commerce platforms like Shopify, WooCommerce, and Magento.

question3.question: What are the hardware requirements for customers using the AR experience?
question3.answer: Most modern smartphones and tablets are compatible with our AR experience. For AR features, we recommend devices running iOS 12+ or Android 8.0+.

question4.question: Can I customize the appearance of the 3D viewer?
question4.answer: Yes, we offer extensive customization options including colors, fonts, and overall layout of the interface. You can also adjust backgrounds and lighting to showcase your jewelry optimally.

footer.tagline: Your first draft is our final masterpiece ✨

performance.title: Lightning-Fast Experience for Tunisia
performance.description: Our platform is specially optimized for Tunisian network conditions, ensuring smooth performance even on lower bandwidth connections. Experience 3D and AR without the wait.
